categories: Category:Sith Lords of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: A red-armored Sith Lord was one of the earliest of his kind. He was clad in red armor from head to toe, which obscured his identity. He carried a lightsaber.
This character was identified as a Sith Warrior by The Dark Side Sourcebook. He also appeared in a flashback in the Tales of the Jedi comic books.
